headline: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (ODFL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. on Valueinvesting subreddit by Sea_Childhood_336. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ODFL. Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. ‘s share was trading at $150.24 as of August 20th. ODFL’s trailing and forward P/E were 29.34 and 30.86 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]

headline: My $100K Model Portfolio For One Of The Market's Biggest Opportunities
summary: Policymakers shift from fighting inflation to fueling a broader economic upswing. See why I'm doubling down on my cyclical recovery and higher-for-longer thesis.
